Templar: I hate being the convoy... alright. Roll out!

He started moving slowly, but just fast enough that Kenzo wouldn't 
fall down.

Templar: Windlord, any bogeys around?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackFang:
> 
> BlackFang did what Templar said and he waited at his signal in 
order 
> to follow Windlord to Base
>

> > Templar: Right... Let's get going, I guess...

> Kenzo

pal"said
